_header: All Holy Church was but a thrall
_description: Carol to St Thomas of Canterbury — seven 5-line stanzas (aaabb) with 2-line burden: ‘Seynt Thomas honour we / Thorgh whos blod Holy Chyrch ys made fre’

BLEge3307.First Lines:
Al holy chyrch was bot a þrallþorgh kyng & temperal
                    lordys all…
BLEge3307.Last Lines:
…clepyd hom translate was heÞus seuen tewsdays worschypyd
                    þe see
